Shrikant K.S wrote:
> Hi,
> Thnks Rainsberger for the information.
> Now i m using Htmlunit to test my JSP page. But i am
> getting error when i create WebClient (WebClient
> webClient = new WebClient()).
> The arror is NoClassDefFoundException
> org/apache/commons/logging/LogFactory
> 
> I have put the common-loggin.jar file in the
> classpath.
> But still error persist.
> can any one help me to come over this error.

The HTMLUnit site has a page describing which .jar files you need on 
your CLASSPATH when you run your tests. Please read it carefully and try 
again. I always have the same experience when I use HTMLUnit for the 
first time on a project, because I never which exactly which .jar files 
I need.
--
